forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 50. South southwest wind 2 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds brightly under a vivid blue sky. The sun casts a warm glow, with temperatures hovering around a gentle 64 degrees. The wind, mild yet playful, dances through the avenues at a brisk ten miles per hour from the west, adding a touch of refreshing coolness to the air. This is not a day for fog or haze; instead, clarity reigns, allowing the iconic skyline and the distant Golden Gate Bridge to present themselves in stunning detail without the heaviness of a marine layer. 

As evening approaches, the temperature will gracefully ease to around 50 degrees. Transitioning from the day’s warmth to the cooler night, a light sweater or a cozy jacket would provide just the right comfort for an evening stroll. The clear skies invite an array of evening activities—consider a leisurely walk along the Embarcadero, where the soothing sounds of the bay intertwine with the city’s heartbeat. Perhaps a visit to one of the nearby cafés could enhance your experience, savoring a warm drink while savoring the bespoken beauty of the city. Take a moment to breathe in the delightful spring air; it offers a perfect blend of warmth and coolness, inviting all to partake in its charm.
